Narrative Urban Encounters.name: Narrative Urban Encounters
Narrative Urban Encounters.text:
The streets of a bustling city can be just as dangerous a place as the untamed wilds. It’s only the kind of threat that changes.

Narrative Urban Encounters

[[/r 1d8]]Encounter
1@UUID[.75KmIsREpHwIRSC4]{Rats and Damnation}
2@UUID[.Z66S7VuMlgB6aFEM]{A Hop, Skip, and Jump}
3@UUID[.AOxPbHncEfQcwWJn]{Desiccated Monks}
4@UUID[.CvDpDwcNLLR04kBs]{Giant Games}
5@UUID[.s5rwZhnL6eGzi5VH]{King of the Hill}
6@UUID[.t3ufE4xZ00Wrb6Rc]{Monkey Business}
7@UUID[.YB76YJG9NK4EmitZ]{Wayward Wrestler}
8@UUID[.w3mQmyyUc6Zc8CN2]{The Vagabond Princess}

Rats and Damnation.name: Rats and Damnation
Rats and Damnation.text: The distraught Gromn (N male half-orc @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.K15Yl8JmB5iPircc]{druid}) urgently beckons to the party from the mouth of an alley. If the party approaches, he rushes to the side of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.q1YJIeIt6rK8fCKn]{giant rat}, his beloved pet, Snoot, who is gravely ill. He explains that his magical attempts to cure her have failed and begs the party for aid. A character can spend 1 minute inspecting the rat; with a successful [[/check Wisdom AnimalHandling dc=12]] or [[/check Wisdom medicine dc=12 format=long]], they can determine that the rat is choking. Looking into the rat’s mouth reveals a gold piece jammed down its gullet. Removing the blockage returns the rat to its happy vigour, after which Gromn tells the party to keep the coin, and gives the party all the berries from one casting of @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Qf6CAZkc7ms4ZY3e]{goodberry}. If the party fails to diagnose the rat within 2 minutes, Gromn picks her up and rushes for help elsewhere.

A Hop, Skip, and Jump.name: A Hop, Skip, and Jump
A Hop, Skip, and Jump.text:
The party notices a crowd of children gathering around a hyperactive child, Renny (CN female human @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.actors.Actor.t40dUCNudBI3V0sS]{sorcerer}), who loudly proclaims that she’s the bouncing legend. Renny notices the party and challenges them to a game, stating that she is too good to face other children anymore. The aim of the game is to make a standing jump from the starting line to any of a series of small squares chalked onto the ground. There are squares every foot up to 15 feet away.

As usual, a character’s maximum standing jump distance equals half their Strength score (rounded down). As the squares are so small, this jumping contest is not just a measure of Strength; a creature must succeed on a [[/check Strength Athletics]] or [[/check Strength acrobatics format=long]] to land precisely. The DC for the check equals twice the distance in feet jumped. On a successful check, the character sticks the jump, on a failure, they miss the small landing target and are disqualified.

Renny suggests a best of three, has a standing long jump distance in feet equal to the VDC, due to her magic, and a Vmod modifier to [[/check str Athletics format=long]]. If the party wins, Renny sullenly gives them her marbles. If they give the marbles back, Renny gives the party five special candies she made; eating a candy causes the consumer to be under the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ZrTc23tToJ0JpH2h]{jump} spell for the next hour.

Desiccated Monks.name: Desiccated Monks
Desiccated Monks.text:
A procession of monks (@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.CHEUjiYrVM9X0vIT]{acolytes}) in brown and white robes shuffles along a street, their leathery, weather-beaten skin pulled tight over their bones. The monks don’t speak, having taken vows of silence, but have various scrolls to pass out, which explain that they are members of the Order of the Blasted Bones; they have given their bodies to the elements and relinquished all physical comfort to achieve enlightenment.

Penance and Payout. One monk offers a random party member a dangerous, holy relic: an @UUID[Item.kEio3ZE4iIs6SsNO]{amulet of dessication}. Whenever a creature attuned to the amulet finishes a long rest, it must succeed on a [[/save con DC 15 format=long]] or gain 1 level of &reference[exhaustion] as moisture is drained from its body. This exhaustion can’t be removed while the creature remains attuned to the amulet. If an attuned creature wears the amulet for 10 consecutive days, the relic transforms into an @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.iiQxTvDOhPGW5spF]{amulet of health}.

Giant Games.name: Giant Games
Giant Games.text:
Perched in a corner of the town square is Tumpy (CN male @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.9g4N9sjyh8Ql46to]{hill giant}; can speak and understand Common). He is sitting on the ground in an unimposing position, hands drooped at his sides, with no weapons in sight. In front of him are three tree stumps set up with a dice set (Vmod 3 modifier), a dragonchess set (Vmod modifier), and a playing card set (Vmod +3 modifier). He challenges the adventurers to one match at each game. To play, one character makes a contested [[/check Intelligence format=long]] against Tumpy using proficiency with the gaming set for the chosen game. The party can choose to have a different character play each match if they wish.

Consequences. If the party loses all three matches, Tumpy bellows a hearty laugh and mocks the party for losing to him, declaring that he will spread word of how they couldn’t beat a dim-witted hill giant. If the party wins only one or two of the matches, Tumpy will thank them for the fun challenge and tell them to move along because it is a busy day and he has other folks waiting to play him. If the party wins all three matches, Tumpy shakes the hand of whichever character won the final match with his painfully strong grip, and then rewards the party by giving it one gaming set of its choice.

King of the Hill.name: King of the Hill
King of the Hill.text: The boisterous Hank Hagon (CG male gnome @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classes.Item.pvEzGSv71zBhaolc]{barbarian}) calls from the centre of a town square, saying he’ll reward any individual that can best him in a contest of strength. He proposes a game—a contestant has three rounds of “combat” to enter the square and physically remove him from its summit. If he’s still up there when the game ends, the contestant loses. The square is 40 feet on a side. Hank has a Vmod bonus to his [[/check Strength Athletics format=long]]. Each party member can play only once, but there’s no penalty for losing. If they win, they receive the champion’s belt that Hank was wearing: a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.ER75WHewYN04Zp11]{belt of hill giant strength}. The belt is, however, cursed: anyone who wears it is compelled to challenge strangers to contests of strength, giving the belt away to the victor.

Monkey Business.name: Monkey Business
Monkey Business.text:
The party spots an alert young @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.JW8bXggOMBx1S6tF]{baboon} observing them from a rooftop or tree. Hanging around its neck is a shiny brass-and-jade amulet. The baboon can be tempted into handing over the necklace as a trade with a successful [[/check charisma ani]] or [[/check Wisdom AnimalHandling format=long]]. The DC depends on what is offered in return: a banana (DC 12), a different shiny trinket (DC 14), a ration or other food (DC 16), or a funny hat (DC 18). Alternatively, the baboon throws the amulet at the party after a party member makes a successful VDC [[/check Charisma Performance format=long]], or an adventurer can steal the amulet from the baboon’s grasp with a successful VDC [[/check Dexterity Slt format=long]] (if they can avoid the Baboon’s [[/check perception passive 11 format=long]]).

The amulet is inscribed with magic runes, and functions as a spell scroll containing one 1st to 3rd level spell from the druid or ranger spell list. After being used, the nonmagical amulet is worth 100 gp.

Wayward Wrestler.name: Wayward Wrestler
Wayward Wrestler.text:
Aralan Feathertouch, a sinewy, anxious wrestler (LG male elf @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.nREPw9g94Bsb9sIl]{tribal warrior}) rushes up to the party, wide-eyed and hair askew. Dressed in a colourful, skin-tight wrestling garb, he has but one word on his lips: “Help!” He had made a deal with a local gang, The Bloodletters, to throw a wrestling match. However, when he found out his opponent was his nemesis, the dwarf Stumpy Shortshaft, pride took over and he won the fight with great aplomb. He is now being chased by the gang and needs help to hide.

Checks. The players must decide if and how they plan to throw The Bloodletters off the scent. After two real life minutes, the gang arrives. Encourage your players to be creative! Possible solutions could be:

  1. Using a disguise to change Aralan’s appearance ([[/tool Dex disg format=long]]).
  2. Deceiving the gang into looking elsewhere ([[/check Charisma Deception format=long]]).
  3. Intimidating the gang into “getting off your territory” by breaking things ([[/check Strength Intimidation format=long]]).
  4. Hiding Aralan under piles of trash ([[/check Wisdom Stealth format=long]]).
  5. Hiding Aralan in an extra dimensional space (automatic success).

You can use the VDC as a standard DC for the ability checks, and reward clever (or silly) thinking by decreasing (or increasing) the DC.

Consequences. The players make ability checks until they get either three successes or three failures. After three successes, the gang moves on, and Aralan offers to train the party with him over the course of a week (or longer, GM’s discretion), granting them the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.classfeatures.Dop1RcU5UdhSVLYS]{Grappler Feat}. After three failures, the gang attacks the party (use the composition of hostile encounter @UUID[JournalEntry.LtjSbHHP2gpZE6Sg.JournalEntryPage.kZ3GGCDtZgUYP18i]{#5 Unwanted Poster}).

The Vagabond Princess.name: The Vagabond Princess
The Vagabond Princess.text:
Princess Isabella Redstone (LG female dwarf @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.13K3XK2A3wwxVKLD]{spy}) is masquerading as the witty and streetsmart wayfarer, Izray. This isn’t the first time she has left her home, seeking adventure and using a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.dQxqcjDm0IxYusCV]{hat of disguise} to have her valet take her place at royal functions. Izray is looking for a group to join, the more dangerous the better. While she wants no share of any treasure, she asks for a nominal fee (gold pieces equal to the APL per week) to cover her expenses.

Consequences. If the party lets her join, she aids them through their next dungeon or monster hunt. At the adventure’s conclusion, she reveals her true identity and offers each party member a Medal of Redstonian Allyship inlaid with a ruby worth 250 gp. This medallion becomes magically embossed with the player character’s name and grants them the help and loyalty of any member of Isabella’s clan.

At Higher Levels. At 5th, 11th, and 17th APL, Izray’s statistics change to that of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.D5UqYD1EnTrJaMTO]{knight}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.fsPruAIDOg4tVrgb]{gladiator}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.EMvcuOpu7ABCmBWi]{assassin}, respectively.

HGtMH Tracking Arctic Region.name: HGtMH Tracking Arctic Region
HGtMH Tracking Arctic Region.description: This adventure provides the resources needed for encounters while tracking in an Arctic Region

Chuul.name: 甲伏怪
Chuul.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Pincer.name: 钳击
Pincer.description:
近战武器攻击：命中+6，触及10尺，单一目标。 命中：11（2d6+4）点钝击伤害。如果目标是大型或更小体型的生物则被擒抱（逃脱DC 14），甲伏怪无法同时擒抱两个以上的生物。

甲伏怪发动一次钳击，如果目标是大型或更小体型的生物则被擒抱

Tentacles.name: 触须
Tentacles.description:
被甲伏怪擒抱的生物必须进行一次DC 13 的体质豁免，豁免失败则中毒 1 分钟。

该中毒期间目标生物陷入麻痹。该目标可以在每个其自己回合结束时再进一次该豁免，豁免成功则终止该效应。

被甲伏怪擒抱的生物必须进行一次体质豁免。该目标可以在每个其自己回合结束时再进一次该豁免，豁免成功则终止该效应。

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: 甲伏怪可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 甲伏怪发动两次钳击攻击。如果它正擒抱生物，则还可以使用一次触须攻击。

Sense Magic.name: 感知魔法
Sense Magic.description: 甲伏怪可以随意探知 120 尺内的魔法。此特质如同法术侦测魔法，但本身不是魔法。

Cloaker.name: 斗篷怪
Cloaker.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+6 to hit,, 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, the cloaker attaches to it.

If the cloaker has advantage against the target, the cloaker attaches to the target's head, and the target is blinded and unable to breathe while the cloaker is attached. While attached, the cloaker can make this attack only against the target and has advantage on the attack roll. The cloaker can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. A creature, including the target, can take its action to detach the cloaker by succeeding on a DC 16 Strength check.

The Cloaker attacks with its Bite. A creature, including the target, can take its action to detach the cloaker by succeeding on a Strength check.

Damage Transfer.name: Damage Transfer
Damage Transfer.description: While attached to a creature, the cloaker takes only half the damage dealt to it (rounded down) and that creature takes the other half.

False Appearance.name: False Appearance
False Appearance.description: While the cloaker remains motionless without its underside exposed, it is indistinguishable from a dark leather cloak.

Light Sensitivity.name: 光照敏感
Light Sensitivity.description: While in bright light, the cloaker has disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The cloaker makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

Tail.name: 尾击
Tail.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+6 to hit,, 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

The Cloaker attacks with its Tail.

Moan.name: 呼嚎
Moan.description:
Each creature within 60 feet of the cloaker that can hear its moan and that isn't an aberration must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the end of the cloaker's next turn.

If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the cloaker's moan for the next 24 hours.

Each creature within 60 feet of the cloaker that can hear its moan and that isn't an aberration must make a Wisdom saving throw.

Phantasms.name: 幻象
Phantasms.description:
The cloaker magically creates three illusory duplicates of itself if it isn't in bright light. The duplicates move with it and mimic its actions, shifting position so as to make it impossible to track which cloaker is the real one. If the cloaker is ever in an area of bright light, the duplicates disappear.

Whenever any creature targets the cloaker with an attack or a harmful spell while a duplicate remains, that creature rolls randomly to determine whether it targets the cloaker or one of the duplicates. A creature is unaffected by this magical effect if it can't see or if it relies on senses other than sight.

A duplicate has the cloaker's AC and uses its saving throws. If an attack hits a duplicate, or if a duplicate fails a saving throw against an effect that deals damage, the duplicate disappears.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The ooze makes two Pseudopod attacks. It can replace one attack with Engulf.

Engulf.name: 吞没
Engulf.description:
The ooze moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter Large or smaller creatures’ spaces. Whenever the ooze enters a creature’s space, the creature must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw.

On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of the ooze. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw.

On a failed save, the ooze enters the creature’s space, and the creature takes 11 ([[/r 2d10]]) acid damage and is engulfed. The engulfed creature can’t breathe, is restrained, and takes 22 ([[/r 4d10]]) acid damage at the start of each of the ooze’s turns. When the ooze moves, the engulfed creature moves with it.

An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a DC 16 Strength check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of the ooze.

Pseudopod.name: 伪足
Pseudopod.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. , one target. Hit: 9 ([[/r 2d8]]) acid damage and the target suffers one of the following random effects (roll a [[/r d10]]):

Foundry note: Use the "other formula" d10 roll to determine what happens using the table below.

1. The target takes 5 ([[/r 1d10]]) force damage.

2. The target takes 5 ([[/r 1d10]]) bludgeoning damage.

3. The target takes 5 ([[/r 1d10]]) piercing damage.

4. The target takes 5 ([[/r 1d10]]) slashing damage.

5. The target takes 5 ([[/r 1d10]]) cold damage.

6. The target takes 5 ([[/r 1d10]]) fire damage.

7. The target takes 5 ([[/r 1d10]]) lightning damage.

8. The target takes 5 ([[/r 1d10]]) thunder damage.

9. The target takes 5 ([[/r 1d10]]) necrotic damage.

10. The target takes 5 ([[/r 1d10]]) radiant damage.

Attack.name: 攻击
Attack.description: The ooze makes one Pseudopod attack.

Reactive Mutations.name: Reactive Mutations
Reactive Mutations.description: Whenever the ooze takes damage, it gains resistance to that damage type immediately afterwards. The ooze can have up to two resistances from this trait. If the ooze has its maximum number of resistances, the oldest resistance is lost when a new one is gained.

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: The ooze can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The ooze uses Engulf and makes two Pseudopod attacks.

Engulf.name: 吞没
Engulf.description:
The ooze moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter Huge or smaller creatures’ spaces. Whenever the ooze enters a creature’s space, the creature must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw.

On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of the ooze. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw.

On a failed save, the ooze enters the creature’s space, and the creature takes 13 ([[/r 2d12]]) acid damage and is engulfed. The engulfed creature can’t breathe, is restrained, and takes 26 ([[/r 4d12]]) acid damage at the start of each of the ooze’s turns. When the ooze moves, the engulfed creature moves with it.

An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a DC 17 Strength check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of the ooze.

Pseudopod.name: 伪足
Pseudopod.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft. , one target. Hit: 10 ([[/r 3d6]]) acid damage and the target suffers one of the following random effects (roll a [[/r d12]]):

Foundry note: Use the "other formula" d12 roll to determine what happens using the table below.

1. The target takes 6 ([[/r 1d12]]) force damage.

2. The target takes 6 ([[/r 1d12]]) bludgeoning damage.

3. The target takes 6 ([[/r 1d12]]) piercing damage.

4. The target takes 6 ([[/r 1d12]]) slashing damage.

5. The target takes 6 ([[/r 1d12]]) fire damage.

6. The target takes 6 ([[/r 1d12]]) cold damage.

7. The target takes 6 ([[/r 1d12]]) lightning damage.

8. The target takes 6 ([[/r 1d12]]) thunder damage.

9. The target takes 6 ([[/r 1d12]]) necrotic damage.

10. The target takes 6 ([[/r 1d12]]) radiant damage.

11. The target takes 6 ([[/r 1d12]]) poison damage.

12. The target takes 6 ([[/r 1d12]]) psychic damage.

Attack.name: 攻击
Attack.description: The ooze makes one Pseudopod attack.

Reactive Mutations.name: Reactive Mutations
Reactive Mutations.description: Whenever the ooze takes damage, it gains resistance to that damage type immediately afterwards. The ooze can have up to two resistances from this trait. If the ooze has its maximum number of resistances, the oldest resistance is lost when a new one is gained.

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: The ooze can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Gibbering Mouther.name: 呓语之口
Gibbering Mouther.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Aberrant Ground.name: 异变丛生
Aberrant Ground.description:
惧噬体周边 10 尺半径的地面成为面团状的困难地形。

在该区域内开始其回合的每个生物都必须进行一次DC 10 的力量豁免，豁免失败者其速度将降至 0，直至其下一回合开始时结束。

惧噬体周边10 尺半径的地面成为面团状的困难地形。请过一个力量豁免

Gibbering.name: 呓语
Gibbering.description:
惧噬体看到任何未处于失能状态的生物时便开始语无伦次的喋喋不休。任何可以听到惧噬体呓语的生物，在惧噬体周边 20 尺内开始其自己回合时，必须进行一次 DC 10 的感知豁免。豁免失败时，该生物直至其下一回合开始前都无法执行反应，并掷一次 d8 以决定接下来自己会怎么做。

骰值为 1 至 4 时，该生物什么都不用做。骰值为 5 至 6 时，该生物将无法执行任何动作或附赠动作，并花费自己所有的移动力向一个随机方向直线移动。骰值为 7 至 8 时，该生物在身边触及范围内随机指定一个生物并对其发动一次近战攻击，如果没有合适的攻击目标则什么都不用做。

惧噬体看见任何生物时便开始语无伦次的喋喋不休。任何可以听到惧噬体呓语的，在惧噬体周边 20 尺内开始其自己回合的生物请过一个感知豁免。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 惧噬体发动一次啃咬攻击，如果条件允许则再使用一次致盲唾沫。

Bites.name: 啃咬
Bites.description:
近战武器攻击：命中 +2，触及 5 尺，单一生物。命中：17（5d6）点穿刺伤害。

如果该目标为中型或更小体型，则它必须进行一次 DC 10 的力量豁免，豁免失败则应击倒地。如果该生物被这次伤害杀死，则它将被惧噬体吸收同化。

惧噬体发动一次啃咬，如果该目标为中型或更小体型，则它必须进行一次力量豁免，豁免失败则应击倒地。

Blinding Spittle.name: 致盲唾液
Blinding Spittle.description:
惧噬体向身边 15 尺内它能看见的一点吐出一团化学液。命中时的冲击力使液团爆发出一片炫目的闪光。闪光处周边 5 尺内的每个生物必须进行一次 DC 13 的敏捷豁免，豁免失败者将陷入目盲，直至该惧噬体下一回合结束时终止。

惧噬体向身边 15 尺内它能看见的一点吐出一团化学液。命中时的冲击力使液团爆发出一片炫目的闪光。闪光处周边 5 尺内的每个生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免

Gray Ooze.name: 灰泥怪
Gray Ooze.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Amorphous.name: 无定形
Amorphous.description: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

Corrode Metal.name: Corrode Metal
Corrode Metal.description:
Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the ooze corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls.

If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits the ooze is destroyed after dealing damage. The ooze can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical metal in 1 round.

The ooze corrodes metal.

False Appearance.name: False Appearance
False Appearance.description: While the ooze remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an oily pool or wet rock.

Pseudopod.name: 伪足
Pseudopod.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+3 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage.

If the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor, its armor is partly corroded and takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

The Gray Ooze attacks with its Pseudopod. If the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor, its armor is partly corroded and takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers.

Otyugh.name: 食腐兽
Otyugh.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Limited Telepathy.name: 有限感应
Limited Telepathy.description: The otyugh can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120 ft. of it that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+6 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw against disease or become poisoned until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 (1d10) on a failure. The disease is cured on a success. The target dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the disease is cured.

The Otyugh attacks with its Bite. If the target is a creature, it must make a Constitution saving throw. Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must repeat the saving throw.

Tentacle.name: 触须
Tentacle.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+6 to hit,, 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 13) and restrained until the grapple ends. The otyugh has two tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

The Otyugh attacks with its Tentacle. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled, and restrained until the grapple ends. The otyugh has two tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

Tentacle Slam.name: 触须猛击
Tentacle Slam.description:
The otyugh slams creatures grappled by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage and be stunned until the end of the otyugh's next turn.

On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't stunned.

The otyugh slams creatures grappled by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must make a Constitution saving throw.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The otyugh makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its tentacles.

Ice Mephit.name: 冰魔蝠
Ice Mephit.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Death Burst.name: 自爆
Death Burst.description:
When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of jagged ice.

Each creature within 5 ft. of it must make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of jagged ice. Each creature within 5 ft. of it must make a Dexterity saving throw.

False Appearance.name: False Appearance
False Appearance.description: While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary shard of ice.

Innate Spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
Innate Spellcasting.description: The mephit can innately cast fog cloud, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

Claws.name: 爪击
Claws.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+3 to hit,, 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) cold damage.

The Ice Mephit attacks with its Claws.

Frost Breath.name: 冷冻吐息
Frost Breath.description:
The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of cold air. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 5 (2d4) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of cold air. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw.

Fog Cloud.name: 云雾术
Fog Cloud.description:
你以施法距离内一点为中心创造一片半径 20 尺的球状浓雾。浓雾在球形内充斥所有角落，并造成重度遮蔽。浓雾持续至法术持续时间结束，但仍可被和风或更强风势（至少每小时 10 里）所吹散。

升环施法： 使用二环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，浓雾的半径就增加 20 尺。

Saber-Toothed Tiger.name: 剑齿虎
Saber-Toothed Tiger.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Keen Smell.name: Keen Smell
Keen Smell.description: 老虎依赖嗅觉进行的感知（察觉）检定具有优势 。

Pounce.name: 扑杀
Pounce.description:
If the tiger moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

If the target is prone, the lion can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

If the tiger moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must make a Strength saving throw.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+6 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

The Saber-Toothed Tiger attacks with its Bite.

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+6 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

The Saber-Toothed Tiger attacks with its Claw.

Skeleton.name: 骷髅
Skeleton.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Shortbow.name: 短弓
Shortbow.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

The Skeleton attacks with its Shortbow.

Shortsword.name: 短剑
Shortsword.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+4 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

The Skeleton attacks with its Shortsword.

Specter.name: 恶灵
Specter.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Incorporeal Movement.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Movement.description:
The specter can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain.

It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

The specter can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain.

Life Drain.name: 吸取生命
Life Drain.description:
Melee Spell Attack:+4 to hit,, 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

The target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

The Specter attacks with its Life Drain.The target must make a Constitution saving throw.

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the specter has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Warhorse Skeleton.name: 骷髅战马
Warhorse Skeleton.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Hooves.name: 蹄击
Hooves.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+6 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

The Warhorse Skeleton attacks with its Hooves.

Wight.name: 尸妖
Wight.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Studded Leather Armor.name: 镶钉皮甲
Studded Leather Armor.description: Made from tough but flexible leather, studded leather is reinforced with close-set rivets or spikes.

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: 处于阳光下时，[[lookup @name]]进行攻击检定，以及进行依赖视觉的感知（察觉）检定时具有劣势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The wight makes two longsword attacks or two longbow attacks. It can use its Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

Longbow.name: 长弓
Longbow.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

The Wight attacks with its Longbow.

Longsword.name: 长剑
Longsword.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+4 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

The Wight attacks with its Longsword.

Life Drain.name: 吸取生命
Life Drain.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+4 to hit,, 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) necrotic damage.

The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under the wight's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The wight can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.

The Wight attacks with its Life Drain. The target must make a Constitution saving throw.

Zombie.name: 丧尸
Zombie.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Slam.name: 粗枝猛击
Slam.description:
近战武器攻击：命中 +3，触及 5 尺 单一目标。伤害：4 （1d6 + 1） 的钝击伤害。

丧尸发动一次猛击

Undead Fortitude.name: 不死坚韧
Undead Fortitude.description:
当僵尸因受非光耀非重击伤害而使其生命值减至 0 时，它必须进行一次 DC 为 5 + 所受伤害值的体质豁免。豁免成功则生命值降至 1。

当僵尸因受到伤害而使其生命值降至 0 ，它必须进行一次体质豁免检定。

Troll.name: 巨魔
Troll.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+7 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

The Troll attacks with its Bite.

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+7 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

The Troll attacks with its Claw.

Keen Smell.name: Keen Smell
Keen Smell.description: [[lookup @name]]依赖嗅觉所进行的感知（察觉）检定具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Regeneration.name: 再生
Regeneration.description:
The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn.

Sea Hag.name: 海鬼婆
Sea Hag.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: 鬼婆可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Horrific Appearance.name: 恐怖形象
Horrific Appearance.description:
任意类人生物在鬼婆 30 尺范围内开始其自己回合时，如果看到鬼婆的真实形态，则该生物必需进行一次 DC 11 的感知豁免。豁免失败的生物将陷入受其恐慌的状态，并持续 1 分钟。该生物每个其自己回合结束时可以再进行一次该豁免。这时如果鬼婆还在其视线范围内，则检定具有劣势。如果再次的检定成功，终止该生物自身的恐慌效应，且该生物在随后的 24 小时内免疫该鬼婆的恐怖形象。

除非目标被突袭或者鬼婆忽然露出真实形态，否则目标可以移开视线避开鬼婆从而跳过最初的豁免检定。该生物开始它自己的下一回合前，由于视线避开鬼婆而使它对该鬼婆发动的攻击检定具有劣势。

任意类人生物在鬼婆 30 尺范围内开始其自己回合时，如果看到鬼婆的真实形态，则该生物必需进行一次感知豁免。

Claws.name: 爪击
Claws.description:
近战武器攻击：命中 +5，， 触及 5 尺， 单一目标。命中：10 （2d6 + 3） 点挥砍伤害。

海鬼婆使用爪击发动攻击。

Death Glare.name: 死亡怒视
Death Glare.description:
The hag targets one frightened creature she can see within 30 ft. of her. If the target can see the hag, it must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or drop to 0 hit points.

The hag targets one frightened creature she can see within 30 ft. of her. If the target can see the hag, it must make a Wisdom saving throw against this magic.

Illusory Appearance.name: 幻形
Illusory Appearance.description:
鬼婆让自己和随身携带的物品笼罩在一层魔法幻象中，使它看上去像体型相仿的另一种丑陋的类人生物。鬼婆可以用一个附赠动作终止幻象。鬼婆死亡时，幻象也随之消失。

这种效应产生的变化无法瞒过任何物理性的检查。鬼婆可以幻化成没有爪子的生物，但它的手摸上去的感觉依然是爪子。看到幻象的生物必需花费一个动作来观察该幻象，成功通过一次 DC 16 的智力（调查）检定即可以看穿鬼婆的伪装。

Wereboar.name: 野猪人
Wereboar.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Charge (Boar or Hybrid Form Only).name: 冲锋（仅野猪或混合形态）
Charge (Boar or Hybrid Form Only).description:
If the wereboar moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with its tusks on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) slashing damage.

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

If the wereboar moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with its tusks on the same turn, the target takes extra slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must make aStrength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Onl.name: 多重攻击（仅类人与混合形态）
Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Onl.description: The wereboar makes two attacks, only one of which can be with its tusks.

Relentless.name: 坚韧
Relentless.description:
If the wereboar takes 14 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

If the wereboar takes damage that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description:
The wereboar can use its action to polymorph into a boar-humanoid hybrid or into a boar, or back into its true form, which is humanoid.

Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

The wereboar can use its action to polymorph, or return to its true form.

Tusks (Boar or Hybrid Form Only).name: 獠牙（仅野猪与混合形态）
Tusks (Boar or Hybrid Form Only).description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+5 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wereboar lycanthropy.

The Wereboar attacks with its Tusks. If the target is a humanoid, it must make a Constitution saving throw.

Maul (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only).name: 巨锤（仅类人或混合形态）
Maul (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only).description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+5 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

The Wereboar attacks with its Maul.

Green Hag.name: 绿鬼婆
Green Hag.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: 鬼婆可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Innate Spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
Innate Spellcasting.description:
The hag's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: dancing lights, minor illusion, vicious mockery

Mimicry.name: 拟声
Mimicry.description:
The hag can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

The hag can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful Wisdom (Insight) check.

Claws.name: 爪击
Claws.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+6 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

The Green Hag attacks with its Claws.

Illusory Appearance.name: 幻形
Illusory Appearance.description:
The hag covers herself and anything she is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like another creature of her general size and humanoid shape. The illusion ends if the hag takes a bonus action to end it or if she dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the hag could appear to have smooth skin, but someone touching her would feel her rough flesh. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a DC 20 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the hag is disguised.

Invisible Passage.name: Invisible Passage
Invisible Passage.description:
The hag magically turns invisible until she attacks or casts a spell, or until her concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). While invisible, she leaves no physical evidence of her passage, so she can be tracked only by magic. Any equipment she wears or carries is invisible with her.

The hag magically turns invisible. Any equipment she wears or carries is invisible with her.

Dancing Lights.name: 舞光术
Dancing Lights.description:
你在施法距离内创造四个火把大小的光源。法术持续时间内，光源能够以火把，灯笼或光球的形态显现并在空中悬浮。你也可以将四个光源合为一个中型类人生物的模糊光影。无论选择哪种方式，每处光源都可以发出半径 10 尺的微光光照。

你在自己回合可以用一个附赠动作令这些光源在施法距离内移动至多 60 尺。每个光源必需在另一个光源周边 20 尺内，而离开施法距离的光源会随即熄灭。

materials.value: 一点磷或光榆木，或者一只萤火虫

Minor Illusion.name: 次级幻象
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束。你也可以用一个动作解除幻象，或者再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其他声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

如果你创造一个物件的影像（比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等），则该物件大小不得大于一个边长5尺的立方体。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物件所穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

生物用其动作调查该声响或影像时，必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免DC的智力（调查）检定，检定成功则判断出眼前即是幻象。幻象在看穿它的生物面前会显得模糊不清。

materials.value: 一小块羊毛

Vicious Mockery.name: 恶言相加
Vicious Mockery.description:
你对施法距离内一个你能看见的生物连珠炮式的说出一串蕴涵魔力的咒骂。如果目标能听见你说话（不一定要听懂），它就必须要进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败者将受到 1d4 点心灵伤害，其下一回合结束前进行第一次攻击检定具有劣势。

你到达 5 级时，该法术的伤害增加 1d4（变为 2d4）。11 级时再加 1d4（变为 3d4），17 级时再加 1d4（变为 4d4）。

Night Hag.name: 夜鬼婆
Night Hag.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Innate Spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
Innate Spellcasting.description:
鬼婆天生施法属性为魅力（法术豁免 DC 14，法术攻击命中 +6）。它天生可施展以下法术且不需要任何相应的材料成分：

随意：侦测魔法，魔法飞弹

每项 2/日：异界传送（仅自身），衰弱射线，睡眠术

Plane Shift (self only).name: 位面转移（仅自身）
Plane Shift (self only).description:
你和至多八个自愿生物手拉手站成一圈，然后被传送到一个不同的存在位面中。你可以概括地指名一个目的地（比如火元素位面的黄铜城，或者九层地狱第二层迪斯帕特的宫殿），然后你将出现在目的地里或其附近。假设你想到达黄铜城，按照 DM 的判断，你可能会传送到达它的钢铁大道上，或它的灰烬之门前，又或者与城市隔着火焰之海相望之处。

另外，如果你知道某个处于另一位面的传送法阵的印记序列，则该法术可以把你带到该法阵处。如果该传送法阵太小而装不下所有你传送的生物，则他们会出现在离传送法阵最近的未占据空间里。

你可以用该法术放逐一个非自愿的生物到另一位面。指定一个你触及范围内的生物并对它进行一次近战法术攻击。命中时，此生物必须进行一次魅力豁免。豁免失败者将被传送到你指定位面的一个随机地点。被这样传送走的生物必须自行寻找回到你现在位面的路。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: 鬼婆对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Claws (Hag Form Only).name: 爪击（仅鬼婆形态）
Claws (Hag Form Only).description:
近战武器攻击：命中 +7，， 触及 5 尺， 单一目标， 命中： 13 （2d8 + 4） 挥砍伤害。.

夜鬼婆使用爪击发动攻击。

Change Shape.name: 变形
Change Shape.description: 鬼婆以魔法将自己 变形 为 小型 或 中型的女性类人生物，或者恢复其真实形态。 各形态下其资料均不会发生变化。 着装或携带的任何装备都不会随之变化。。 如果鬼婆死亡，则它恢复为其真实形态。

Etherealness.name: 以太化
Etherealness.description: 鬼婆用魔法在物质位面和以太位面之间进行转移。使用该动作时，鬼婆所在的位置必需有一颗心石。

Nightmare Haunting.name: 噩梦缠身
Nightmare Haunting.description:
处于以太位面时，鬼婆以魔法触碰一个物质位面里睡梦中的类人生物。若目标受法术 防护善恶 或 防护法阵 影响，则可防止这次接触。

如果接触完成，目标将见到可怕的异像。如果异像持续不少于 1 小时，目标将失去它本次休息的得益，且其生命值上限减损 5 (1d10)。如果该减损效果导致目标生命值上限降为 0，则目标死亡。如果此时目标的阵营为邪恶，则目标的灵魂将被困于鬼婆的灵魂袋中。目标生命值上限的减损效应将一直维持，直到接受法术 高等复原术 或类似法术的治疗。

处于以太位面时，鬼婆以魔法触碰一个物质位面里睡梦中的类人生物。如果接触完成，目标将见到可怕的异像。

Detect Magic.name: 侦测魔法
Detect Magic.description: 你在法术持续时间内能感测到 30 尺内存在的魔法。感测到魔法的存在后，你可以使用动作，来看到任何你能看见的具有魔法的生物或物件周围环绕着微弱的灵光，并分辨出其所属的魔法学派（若有）。该法术可以穿透大部分障碍，但仍会被 1 尺厚石质，或 1 寸厚金属质，或一层薄铅质，或 3 尺厚木质或泥质材料阻隔。

Magic Missile.name: 魔法飞弹
Magic Missile.description:
You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4 + 1 force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the spell creates one more dart for each slot level above 1st.

Ray of Enfeeblement.name: 衰弱射线
Ray of Enfeeblement.description:
你从指尖射出一道让人衰弱的黑色能量射线并射向施法距离内的一个生物。你对目标进行一次远程法术攻击。若命中，则目标在法术终止前，其使用基于力量的武器进行攻击时只造成一半伤害。

目标在其每回合结束时可以进行一次对抗该法术的体质豁免。豁免成功则法术终止。

Sleep.name: 睡眠术
Sleep.description:
该法术使一些生物陷入魔法造成的沉睡中。掷一次 5d8；其结果为受该法术影响生物的生命值总数。你指定施法距离一点，该点周围 20 尺区域内的生物以剩余生命值由小至大的顺序受法术影响（生效时忽略昏迷生物）。

计算受法术影响生物时，从剩余生命值最低的生物开始逐个计算。每个受术生物均陷入昏迷，直至法术终止。睡眠者受到伤害也会惊醒，又或者由其他人以一个动作将其摇醒或打醒。法术掷骰的生命值总数减去一个受术生物的生命值后，余数再用以计算生命值稍高者是否受法术影响。生物剩余生命值，必须小于等于该余数法术才能成功影响该生物。

亡灵以及免疫魅惑效果的生物不受该法术影响。

升环施法： 使用二环或更高法术位施展该法术时，使用的法术位每比一环高一环，法术的掷骰就增加 2d8。

materials.value: 一把细沙，玫瑰花瓣，或一只蟋蟀

Animate Trees.name: 活化树木
Animate Trees.description:
The treant magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These trees have the same statistics as a treant, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the Slam action option.

An animated tree acts as an ally of the treant. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until the treant dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree; or until the treant takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

The treant magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it.

False Appearance.name: False Appearance
False Appearance.description: While the treant remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The treant makes two slam attacks.

Treant Rock.name: Treant Rock
Treant Rock.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

The Treant attacks with its Rock.

Siege Monster.name: 攻城怪物
Siege Monster.description: The treant deals double damage to objects and structures.

Slam.name: 粗枝猛击
Slam.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+10 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

The Treant attacks with its Slam.

Ice Devil.name: 冰魔
Ice Devil.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+10 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage.

The Ice Devil attacks with its Bite.

Devil's Sight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil's Sight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: 魔鬼对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Wall of Ice.name: 冰墙术
Wall of Ice.description:
The devil magically forms an opaque wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall is 1 foot thick and up to 30 feet long and 10 feet high, or it's a hemispherical dome up to 20 feet in diameter.

When the wall appears, each creature in its space is pushed out of it by the shortest route. The creature chooses which side of the wall to end up on, unless the creature is incapacitated. The creature then makes a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 (10d6) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The wall lasts for 1 minute or until the devil is incapacitated or dies. The wall can be damaged and breached; each 10-foot section has AC 5, 30 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to acid, cold, necrotic, poison, and psychic damage. If a section is destroyed, it leaves behind a sheet of frigid air in the space the wall occupied. Whenever a creature finishes moving through the frigid air on a turn, willingly or otherwise, the creature must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The frigid air dissipates when the rest of the wall vanishes.

The devil magically forms an opaque wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall is 1 foot thick and up to 30 feet long and 10 feet high, or it's a hemispherical dome up to 20 feet in diameter.When the wall appears, each creature in its space is pushed out of it by the shortest route. The creature chooses which side of the wall to end up on, unless the creature is incapacitated. The creature then makes a Dexterity saving throw.

The wall can be damaged and breached. If a section is destroyed, it leaves behind a sheet of frigid air in the space the wall occupied. Whenever a creature finishes moving through the frigid air on a turn, willingly or otherwise, the creature must make a Constitution saving throw.

attack.condition: a solid surface it can see within 60 ft.

save.condition: a solid surface it can see within 60 ft.

utility.condition: a solid surface it can see within 60 ft.

Tail.name: 尾击
Tail.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+10 to hit,, 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage.

The Ice Devil attacks with its Tail.

Claws.name: 爪击
Claws.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+10 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage.

The Ice Devil attacks with its Claws.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The devil makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its claws, and one with its tail.

Vampire.name: 吸血鬼
Vampire.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description:
假如吸血鬼没有暴露在日光下或身处流水中, 它就可以用自己的动作变形为微型的蝙蝠或中型的迷雾，或以同样的动作变回其真实形态。

在蝙蝠型态下，吸血鬼不能说话，且其移动速度为5 尺， 飞行速度 30 尺。 除速度和体型外，吸血鬼的其他资料不变。其着装的东西会随之变化，但其携带物品则不然。一旦它死亡，便会恢复其真实形态。在迷雾形态下，吸血鬼无法执行任何动作，包括说话或影响其他物件。迷雾没有重量，且拥有 20 尺的飞行速度，它可以原地徘徊，也可以进入敌对生物所在的空间停留。只要是空气可以进入的空间，迷雾也可以如常通过而不需要挤入，只是不能穿过水源。它进行力量、敏捷与体质豁免时具有 优势 ，同时免疫一切非魔法伤害，但仍会被日光所伤。

吸血鬼可以使用其动作来 变形 或变回其真实形态。

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: If the vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Misty Escape.name: 雾隐遁行
Misty Escape.description:
吸血鬼在休眠地之外，被降至0 生命值时会转化为迷雾形态（如变形生物特质所述），而不是陷入昏迷，前提是其必须未处于日光中或流水里。如果其不能变形，则被摧毁。

于0 生命值维持迷雾形态的吸血鬼无法变回吸血鬼形态，并且必须在 2 小时内回到其休眠地，否则将被摧毁。到达休眠地后，它便可以恢复其吸血鬼形态，并在回复至少1 生命值前始终处于麻痹状态。吸血鬼维持0 生命值在休眠地停留1小时后将回复为1 生命值。

被杀死的吸血鬼会变成一团迷雾（就像变形生物特性一样），而不是陷入昏迷。

Regeneration.name: 再生
Regeneration.description:
吸血鬼在其自己的回合开始时恢复20 点生命值，前提是它至少有1 点生命值且并未处于日光中或流水里。如果其受到光耀伤害或受圣水的伤害，则该吸血鬼的该特质在其下一回合开始时无法生效。

吸血鬼在其自己的回合开始时恢复20 点生命值。

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: 吸血鬼无需进行属性检定就能攀爬于困难表面，包括倒挂在天花板上。

Vampire Weaknesses.name: 吸血鬼弱点
Vampire Weaknesses.description:
吸血鬼拥有以下弱点：

禁入。 吸血鬼得不到一位居住者的邀请时无法进入相应的民宅。

流水之伤。 吸血鬼在自己的回合结束时，如果身处流水中则将受 20 点强酸伤害。

木桩穿心。 吸血鬼在其休眠地处于失能状态时，如果以木质穿刺伤害武器刺穿其心脏，则该吸血鬼将陷入麻痹，效应直至穿刺物被移除为止。

日照过敏。 吸血鬼在其自己的回合开始时若处于阳光直射下，则受 20 点光耀伤害。此外，他的攻击检定与属性检定也具有 劣势 。

Multiattack (Vampire Form Only).name: 多重攻击（仅吸血鬼形态）
Multiattack (Vampire Form Only).description: 吸血鬼发动两次攻击，其中只能有一次啃咬攻击。

Unarmed Strike (Vampire Form Only).name: 徒手打击 (仅限吸血鬼形态)
Unarmed Strike (Vampire Form Only).description:
近战武器攻击:+9 命中,, 5 尺., 单一生物。 伤害: 8 (1d8 + 4) 钝击伤害.

或者选择不造成伤害，而让吸血鬼以此擒抱目标 (逃脱 DC 18).

吸血鬼使用徒手打击发动攻击。

Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only).name: 啃咬（仅蝙蝠或吸血鬼形态）
Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only).description:
近战武器攻击：+9 命中，5 尺， 单一自愿生物， 或单一被吸血鬼擒抱生物， 以及失能生物， 被束缚生物。 伤害： 7 （1d6 + 4） 穿刺伤害 外加 10 （3d6） 暗蚀伤害。

目标的生命值上限承受等同该暗蚀伤害数值的减损， 吸血鬼则回复等量的生命值。 减损效应持续至目标完成一次长休。 如果该攻击将目标的生命值上限降至 0，则目标死亡。 以该方式死亡并被葬入土中的类人生物，将在随后的夜晚复活为受控于该吸血鬼的吸血鬼衍体。

吸血鬼使用啃咬发动攻击

Charm.name: 魅惑
Charm.description:
吸血鬼指定其周边 30 尺一个它能看见的类人生物。如果目标也能看见该吸血鬼， 则其必须通过一次 DC 17 感知 豁免以抵抗该魔法，否则将被吸血鬼魅惑。 受魅惑的目标会把吸血鬼视作需要重视与保护的挚友。尽管目标并未在吸血鬼控制之下，但仍会以最有利的方式接受吸血鬼的请求或行动，也会自愿作为吸血鬼啃咬的攻击对象。

每当吸血鬼或吸血鬼的同伴对目标实施伤害举动时，该目标都可以再次进行该豁免，豁免成功则终止该魅惑效应。否则，该效应将持续 24 小时，或持续至吸血鬼被摧毁，吸血鬼与目标处于不同存在位面。吸血鬼本人也可以用一个附赠动作主动解除该效应。

吸血鬼对 30 尺内的一个类人生物为目标，如果目标能看到吸血鬼， 则目标必须进行一次 感知 豁免以抵抗该魔法。

Children of the Night.name: 夜之子
Children of the Night.description:
只要太阳还没升起，吸血鬼便可以用魔法召集2d4的蝙蝠集群或大鼠集群。 在户外时, 吸血鬼也可以选择召集 3d6 只狼.

召唤生物将在 1d4 轮后到达, 并作为吸血鬼的盟友听从其指挥。这些动物将停留1小时，或直到该吸血鬼死亡。该吸血鬼也可以用一个附赠动作将其遣散。

吸血鬼用魔法召集蝙蝠或大鼠。在户外时，吸血鬼可以召唤狼代替。

Legendary Actions.name: 传奇动作
Legendary Actions.description:
吸血鬼拥有 3 传奇动作，用来选择执行下列动作项。它每次只可选择执行一个传奇动作项，且必须在另一生物回合结束时执行。吸血鬼在其回合开始时恢复所有消耗的传奇动作数。

吸血鬼拥有 3 传奇动作。

Lair Actions.name: 巢穴动作
Lair Actions.description:
如果一个传说生物拥有巢穴动作，它可以使用它们来利用其巢穴中的环境魔法。在先攻值 20 时（所有先攻顺序均无效），它可以使用其巢穴动作选项之一。当它处于失能状态或因其他原因无法执行动作时，则不能这样做。如果被突袭，它在战斗中的第一个回合结束前不能使用巢穴动作。

如果一个传说生物拥有巢穴动作，它可以使用它们来利用其巢穴中的环境魔法。

Regional Effects.name: 区域效应
Regional Effects.description: 该栏目描述了传奇生物的存在可能使周围环境产生的惊人怪异效应。传奇生物死亡后，这些区域效应可能立即消失或是随着时间逐渐消退。

Move.name: 移动
Move.description: 吸血鬼移动至多等于其自身速度的距离，且不会因此引发借机攻击。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: 吸血鬼发动一次啃咬攻击。

Vampire Spawn.name: 初生吸血鬼
Vampire Spawn.description: 指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
近战武器攻击：+6 命中，5 尺， 单一自愿生物， 或单一被吸血鬼擒抱生物， 以及失能生物， 被束缚生物。 伤害： 6 （1d6 + 3） 穿刺伤害 外加 7 （2d6） 暗蚀伤害。

目标的生命值上限承受等同该暗蚀伤害数值的减损， 吸血鬼则回复等量的生命值。 减损效应持续至目标完成一次长休。 如果该攻击将目标的生命值上限降至 0，则目标死亡。

吸血鬼衍体使用啃咬发动攻击。

Claws.name: 爪击
Claws.description:
近战武器攻击：命中 +6，触及 5 尺，单一生物。伤害：8 （2d4 + 3） 点挥砍伤害。

吸血鬼衍体使用爪击发动攻击。吸血鬼可以选择不造成伤害，而是擒抱目标。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 吸血鬼发动两次攻击，其中只能有一次啃咬攻击。

Regeneration.name: 再生
Regeneration.description:
吸血鬼在其自己的回合开始时恢复10 点生命值，前提是它至少有1 点生命值且并未处于日光中或流水里。如果其受到光耀伤害或受圣水的伤害，则该吸血鬼的该特质在其下一回合开始时无法生效。

吸血鬼在其自己的回合开始时恢复10 点生命值。

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: 吸血鬼无需进行属性检定就能攀爬于困难表面，包括倒挂在天花板上。

Vampire Weaknesses.name: 吸血鬼弱点
Vampire Weaknesses.description:
吸血鬼拥有以下弱点：

禁入。 吸血鬼得不到一位居住者的邀请时无法进入相应的民宅。

流水之伤。 吸血鬼在自己的回合结束时，如果身处流水中则将受 20 点强酸伤害。

木桩穿心。 吸血鬼在其休眠地处于失能状态时，如果以木质穿刺伤害武器刺穿其心脏，则该吸血鬼将被摧毁。

日照过敏。 吸血鬼在其自己的回合开始时若处于阳光直射下，则受 20 点光耀伤害。此外，他的攻击检定与属性检定也具有 劣势 。

Frost Giant.name: 霜巨人
Frost Giant.description: 指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

Rock.name: 投石
Rock.description:
远程武器攻击：命中+9，射程60/240尺，单一目标。命中：28 (4d10 + 6) 钝击伤害。

霜巨人用其岩石发动攻击。

Patchwork Armor.name: 拼凑护甲
Patchwork Armor.description: 一种由厚毛皮制作的粗糙护甲。常见使用人群包括：野蛮人部落、邪恶类人生物以及其他缺少资源制作更好护甲的人。

Greataxe.name: 巨斧
Greataxe.description:
近战武器攻击：命中 +9，， 触及 10 尺， 单一目标。命中：25 （3d12 + 6） 点挥砍伤害。

霜巨人使用其巨斧发动攻击。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 该巨人发动两次[[/item Greataxe]]{巨斧}攻击。

Berserker.name: 狂战士
Berserker.description: 指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

Hide Armor.name: 兽皮甲
Hide Armor.description: 一种由厚毛皮制作的粗糙护甲。常见使用人群包括：野蛮人部落、邪恶类人生物以及其他缺少资源制作更好护甲的人。

Reckless.name: 鲁莽
Reckless.description: 狂战士可以在自己回合开始时进入鲁莽状态，其发动的所有近战武器攻击的攻击检定均具有优势，所有对其发动的攻击检定也同样具有优势，持续直至他的下一回合开始。

Greataxe.name: 巨斧
Greataxe.description:
近战武器攻击：命中 +5，， 触及 5 尺， 单一目标。命中：9 （1d12 + 3） 点挥砍伤害。

狂战士使用其巨斧发动攻击。

Adult Red Dragon.name: 成年红龙
Adult Red Dragon.description: 指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: 巨龙豁免失败时，可以将其改为豁免成功。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 红龙使用骇人威仪，并发动三次攻击：一次啃咬攻击与两次爪击攻击。

Frightful Presence.name: 骇人威仪
Frightful Presence.description:
巨龙指定周边120 尺范围内若干意识到其存在的生物，每个目标都必须进行一次DC 16 的感知豁免，豁免失败者将陷入1 分钟的恐慌状态。

该被恐慌生物可以在其自己回合结束时再进行一次该豁免，豁免成功则终止该生物身上的恐慌效应。豁免成功或身上的该效应结束的生物，将在接下来的 24 小时内免疫该龙的骇人威仪。

巨龙指定周边 120 尺范围内若干意识到其存在的生物，每个目标都必须进行一次感知豁免。该被恐慌生物可以在其自己回合结束时再进行一次该豁免。

Fire Breath.name: 火焰吐息
Fire Breath.description:
敏捷豁免检定： DC 21，60 尺锥状区域内的所有生物。失败：受到 63 (18d6) 火焰伤害，成功：半伤。

巨龙在 60 尺锥形区域内喷吐火焰。该区域内的所有生物需进行一次 敏捷豁免检定。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
近战攻击检定：+14，触及 10 尺， 单一目标。命中：19 (2d10 + 8)穿刺伤害。

成年红龙使用其利齿发动攻击。

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description:
近战攻击检定：+14，触及 5 尺， 单一目标。命中：15 (2d6 + 8) 挥砍伤害。

成年红龙使用其利爪发动攻击。

Tail.name: 尾击
Tail.description:
近战攻击检定：+14 命中，, 触及 15 尺， 单一目标。命中：17 (2d8 + 8) 钝击伤害。

成年红龙使用其尾部发动攻击。

Legendary Actions.name: 传奇动作
Legendary Actions.description:
米纳佐龙拥有 3 传奇动作，用来选择执行下列动作项。它每次只可选择执行一个传奇动作项，且必须在另一生物回合结束时执行。米纳佐龙在其回合开始时恢复所有消耗的传奇动作数。

米纳佐龙拥有 3 传奇动作。

Detect.name: 侦查
Detect.description:
米纳佐龙进行一次感知（察觉）检定。

米纳佐龙注视着其周边环境……

Tail Attack.name: 扫尾攻击
Tail Attack.description:
巨龙发动一次尾击攻击。

巨龙以粗长的尾部猛力挥扫敌人！

Wing Attack.name: 振翅攻击
Wing Attack.description:
巨龙挥动它的翅膀。巨龙 10 尺内的每个生物需进行一次DC 22 敏捷豁免检定，失败则受到15（2d6 + 8）钝击伤害并陷入倒地状态。红龙还可以飞行至多等于其飞行速度一半的距离。

巨龙挥动它的翅膀！

Lair Actions.name: 巢穴动作
Lair Actions.description:
如果一个传说生物拥有巢穴动作，它可以使用它们来利用其巢穴中的环境魔法。在先攻值 20 时（所有先攻顺序均无效），它可以使用其巢穴动作选项之一。当它处于失能状态或因其他原因无法执行动作时，则不能这样做。如果被突袭，它在战斗中的第一个回合结束前不能使用巢穴动作。

如果一个传说生物拥有巢穴动作，它可以使用它们来利用其巢穴中的环境魔法。

Regional Effects.name: 区域效应
Regional Effects.description: 该栏目描述了传奇生物的存在可能使周围环境产生的惊人怪异效应。传奇生物死亡后，这些区域效应可能立即消失或是随着时间逐渐消退。

Salamander.name: 火蜥蜴
Salamander.description: 指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

Heated Body.name: 灼热之躯
Heated Body.description:
生物触碰火蜥蜴，或者在其周边 5 尺范围内以近战攻击命中火蜥蜴时，将受到7 （2d6） 点火焰伤害。

生物触碰火蜥蜴，或者在其周边 5 尺范围内以近战攻击命中火蜥蜴时，将受到火焰伤害。

Heated Weapons.name: 炽热武器
Heated Weapons.description:
火蜥蜴持用任何金属质近战武器命中目标时，都可以额外造成3（1d6）点火焰伤害（已包含在攻击条目中）。

火蜥蜴持用任何金属质近战武器命中目标时，都可以额外造成火焰伤害（已包含在攻击条目中）。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 火蜥蜴发动两次攻击：一次用它的矛，一次用它的尾巴。

Salamander Tail.name: 火蜥蜴尾
Salamander Tail.description:
近战武器攻击：命中 +7，， 触及 10 尺，单一目标。命中：11（2d6+4）点钝击伤害外加7（2d6）点火焰伤害。

目标被擒抱（逃脱 DC 14）。直至此擒抱结束，目标受束缚，火蝾螈可以自动用其尾巴命中目标，且火蝾螈无法对其他目标进行尾击。

火蝾螈使用其尾击发动攻击。目标被擒抱。直至此擒抱结束，目标受束缚，火蝾螈可以自动用其尾巴命中目标，且火蝾螈无法对其他目标进行尾击。

Spear.name: 矛
Spear.description:
近战或远程武器攻击：命中 +7，触及 5 尺或射程 20/60 尺，单一目标。命中：11 （2d6 + 4） 穿刺伤害，或使用双手发动近战攻击时13 （2d8 + 4） 穿刺伤害，外加3 （1d6） 火焰伤害。

火蜥蜴使用矛发动攻击。

Young White Dragon.name: 青年白龙
Young White Dragon.description: 指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
近战武器攻击：命中 +7，触及 10 尺，单一目标。伤害：15 （2d10 + 4） 点穿刺伤害，外加 4 （1d8） 点寒冷伤害。

青年白龙用啃咬发动攻击。

attack.chatFlavor: 巨龙张开它的大口啃咬敌人。

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description:
近战武器攻击：命中 +7，触及 5 尺，单一目标。伤害：11 （2d6 + 4） 点挥砍伤害。

青年白龙用利爪发动攻击。

attack.chatFlavor: 该龙用它的其中一只爪子进行攻击。

Cold Breath.name: 寒冷吐息
Cold Breath.description:
巨龙呼出冰暴并覆盖一处 30 尺的锥状区域，该区域内的每个生物都必须进行一次DC 15 体质豁免，豁免失败者将受到45（10d8）寒冷伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

巨龙呼出冰暴并覆盖一处 30 尺的锥状区域，该区域内的每个生物都必须进行一次体质豁免。

save.chatFlavor: 巨龙喷吐出它致命的吐息攻击。

Ice Walk.name: 冰上行走
Ice Walk.description: 白龙可以在冰面上穿行和攀爬而无需进行属性检定。此外，其穿过由冰或雪组成的困难地形时也不需要花费额外的移动力。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 红龙发动三次攻击，一次啃咬和两次爪击。

Remorhaz.name: 百足魔兽
Remorhaz.description: 指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
近战武器攻击:+11命中，， 10尺， 单一目标. 伤害: 40 (6d10 + 7) 穿刺伤害 外加 10 (3d6) 火焰伤害.

如果目标是一生物，则目标被擒抱（逃脱DC 17）。直至擒抱终止前目标被束缚，且熔岩巨虫不能再对其他目标使用啃咬攻击。

熔岩巨虫使用啃咬发动攻击。如果目标是生物，则将其擒抱。直至擒抱终止前目标被束缚，且熔岩巨虫不能再对其他目标使用啃咬攻击。

Heated Body.name: 灼热之躯
Heated Body.description:
生物触碰熔喉兽，或者在其周边 5 尺范围内以近战攻击命中熔喉兽时，将受到10 (3d6) 火焰伤害。

生物触碰熔喉兽，或者在其周边 5 尺范围内以近战攻击命中熔喉兽时，将受到火焰伤害。

Swallow.name: 吞咽
Swallow.description:
雷莫拉兹对正被它擒抱的中型或更小体型生物发动一次啃咬攻击。

若该攻击命中，则该生物受到啃咬伤害并被吞下，擒抱状态结束。被吞下期间，该生物陷入目盲且被束缚，其对于雷莫拉兹身体外的攻击或效应视为处于全掩护，并在每次该雷莫拉兹的回合开始时受21 (6d6) 强酸伤害。

雷莫拉兹使用其{吞咽 Swallow}发动攻击。

Doppelganger.name: 变形怪
Doppelganger.description: 指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

Ambusher.name: 伏击
Ambusher.description: 战斗开始的第一轮里，变形怪对任何成功受其突袭的生物所发动的攻击检定具有优势。

Surprise Attack.name: 突袭攻击
Surprise Attack.description: 变形怪成功突袭一个生物，并在战斗开始后第一轮中发动攻击命中该生物时，该目标将在该次攻击中额外受到 10（3d6）点同类型伤害。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 变形怪发动两次近战攻击。

Slam.name: 粗枝猛击
Slam.description:
近战武器攻击：命中 +6，触及 5 尺 单一目标。伤害：7 （1d6 + 4） 的钝击伤害。

拟身怪发动一次猛击。

Read Thoughts.name: 读心
Read Thoughts.description:
变形怪用魔法读取其 60 尺内一个生物的表层思想。该效应可穿透一些障碍物，但无法穿透 3 尺厚的木质或土质，2 尺厚的石质，2 寸厚的金属质或一薄层的铅板。

目标身处该距离内时，变形怪只要保持专注就可以持续阅读思想（如同专注一个法术）。读取目标的思想时，变形怪对该目标进行的感知（洞悉）和魅力（欺骗，威吓，游说）检定具有优势。

变形怪用魔法读取其 60 尺内一个生物的表层思想。

Shapechanger.name: 变形生物
Shapechanger.description:
变形怪用它的动作变形为一个它曾见过的小型或中型体型的类人生物，或是用该动作恢复其真实形态。

除体型外，它的所有数据在每个形态时均相同，其着装和携带的装备也不会随变形发生变化。变形怪死亡时将恢复其真实形态。

变形怪用它的动作变形为一个它曾见过的小型或中型体型的类人生物，或是用该动作恢复其真实形态。

Berserk.name: 失心狂怒
Berserk.description:
魔像以40点生命值或更低生命值开始其自己回合时，骰一次d6。骰值为6时，魔像开始失心狂怒。在狂怒持续期间的每个自己回合里，魔像将攻击距离它最近且它能看见的生物。

如果在其移动并攻击的范围内没有符合条件的生物，则该魔像将攻击一个物件，并且会优先选择比自己体型尺寸更小的物件。魔像一旦开始狂怒，便会一直持续到被破坏或回复所有生命值为止。狂怒魔像的其制作者如果在身边60尺范围内，则可以尝试以坚定的说服性话语使其冷静下来。该魔像必须可以听到其制作者的话，而制作者必须执行一个动作来进行一次DC 15魅力（说服）检定。如果检定成功，则该魔像停止狂怒。如果它在生命值仍为40点或更低时再次受到伤害，则该魔像可能再次开始狂怒。

魔像开始失心狂怒。在狂怒持续期间的每个自己回合里，魔像将攻击距离它最近且它能看见的生物。如果在其移动并攻击的范围内没有符合条件的生物，则该魔像将攻击一个物件，并且会优先选择比自己体型尺寸更小的物件。

Aversion of Fire.name: 厌火
Aversion of Fire.description:
若魔像受到火焰伤害，则直至其下一回合结束，其进行的攻击检定和属性检定都具有劣势。

若魔像受到火焰伤害，其进行的某些检定将具有劣势。

Immutable Form.name: 不变形态
Immutable Form.description: 魔像免疫任何可以改变其形态的法术或效应。

Lightning Absorption.name: 闪电吸收
Lightning Absorption.description: 魔像受闪电伤害时不会损伤，反而会恢复与伤害值相等的生命值。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: 魔像对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Magic Weapons.name: 魔法武器
Magic Weapons.description: 魔像的武器攻击视为魔法攻击。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 魔像发动两次猛击攻击。

Slam.name: 粗枝猛击
Slam.description:
近战武器攻击：命中+7，，触及5尺，单一目标。命中：13（2d8 + 4）钝击伤害。

血肉魔像使用猛击进行攻击。

Mimic.name: 拟身怪
Mimic.description:
指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

Shapechanger.name: 变形生物
Shapechanger.description:
拟形怪可以用它的动作变形成一个物体，或变回其真实的无定形形态。其属性数据在每种形态下均相同。

它所穿戴或携带的任何装备不会被转化。如果死亡，它会恢复真实形态。

拟形怪可以用它的动作变形成一个物体，或变回其真实的无定形形态。

Adhesive (Object Form Only).name: 粘附（仅物件形态）
Adhesive (Object Form Only).description:
拟身怪可以黏住任何触碰到它的东西。体型为大型或更小体型的生物被拟身怪黏着时视为被其擒抱（逃脱DC 13）。其为逃脱擒抱而进行的属性检定具有劣势。

拟身怪可以黏住任何触碰到它的东西。体型为大型或更小体型的生物被拟身怪黏着时视为被其擒抱。进行一次逃脱检定，且具有劣势。

False Appearance (Object Form Only).name: 拟形（仅物件形态）
False Appearance (Object Form Only).description: 拟身怪静止不动时与普通的物件几乎一模一样。

Grappler.name: 擒抱者
Grappler.description: 拟身怪对被其擒抱的生物发动攻击检定时具有优势。

Pseudopod.name: 伪足
Pseudopod.description:
近战武器攻击：命中 +5，， 触及 5 尺， 单一目标。命中：7 （1d8 + 3） 点钝击伤害。

如果拟形怪处于物体形态，目标会受到其粘附特性的影响。

拟形怪使用其伪足发动攻击。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
近战武器攻击：命中 +5，， 触及 5 尺， 单一目标。命中：7 （1d8 + 3） 点穿刺伤害 外加 4 （1d8） 点强酸伤害。

拟形怪使用啃咬发动攻击。

Werebear.name: 熊人
Werebear.description:
指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

Shapechanger.name: 变形生物
Shapechanger.description:
熊人可以消耗其动作变形为大型熊人混种形态或大型熊形态，或变回其类人生物的真实形态。

除体型与护甲等级外，它在各形态下的属性数据均相同。它所穿戴或携带的任何装备均不会随之变形。若死亡，它将恢复真实形态。

熊人可以消耗其动作变形，或恢复真实形态。

Keen Smell.name: 敏锐嗅觉
Keen Smell.description: 熊人依赖嗅觉所进行的感知（察觉）检定具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 在熊形态下，熊人发动两次[[/item Claw]]{爪击}。在类人形态下，它发动两次[[/item Greataxe]]{巨斧}攻击。在混合形态下，它可以像熊或类人一样攻击。

Bite (Bear or Hybrid Form Only).name: 啃咬（仅熊或混合形态）
Bite (Bear or Hybrid Form Only).description:
近战武器攻击：命中 +7，， 触及 5 尺， 单一目标。命中：15 (2d10 + 4) 点穿刺伤害。

如果目标是类人生物，它必须成功通过一次 DC 14 体质 豁免检定，否则将被诅咒患上熊人狼化症。

熊人使用啃咬攻击。如果目标是类人生物，它必须进行一次 体质 豁免检定。

Claw (Bear or Hybrid Form Only).name: 爪击 (仅熊或混合形态)
Claw (Bear or Hybrid Form Only).description:
近战武器攻击：命中 +7，， 触及 5 尺， 单一目标。命中： 13 （2d8 + 4） 挥砍伤害。.

熊人使用爪击发动攻击。

Greataxe (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only).name: 巨斧 (仅类人或混合形态)
Greataxe (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only).description:
近战武器攻击：命中 +7，， 触及 5 尺， 单一目标。命中：10 （1d12 + 4） 点挥砍伤害。

熊人使用其巨斧发动攻击。

Frostnip (a).name: 冻伤 (a)
Frostnip (a).description: 指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

Leather Armor.name: 皮甲
Leather Armor.description: 该护甲的护胸和护肩由通过油煮硬化的皮子制成。护甲的其余部分则由更软更灵活的材料制作。

Dark Devotion.name: 黑暗忠诚
Dark Devotion.description: 邪教狂信者为抵抗魅惑和恐慌而进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
狂信者作为 4 级施法者，其施法属性为感知（法术豁免 DC 11，法术攻击命中 +3）。

狂信者准备了以下牧师法术：

戏法（随意）：光亮术，圣火术，奇术

1 环（4 法术位）：命令术，致伤术，虔诚护盾

2 环（3 法术位）：定身类人，灵体武器

狂信者是一个施法者，其施法属性为感知。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 邪教狂信者发动两次近战攻击。

Dagger.name: 匕首
Dagger.description:
近战或远程武器攻击：命中+4，触及5尺或射程20/60尺，单一生物。命中：4 (1d4 + 2) 穿刺伤害。

邪教狂信者使用匕首发动攻击。

Light.name: 光亮术
Light.description:
你触碰一个大型或者更小，且未被他人携带或着装的物件。在法术终止前，物件将在其 20 尺半径范围内发出明亮光照，并在其外 20 尺范围发出微光光照。光的颜色由你决定。该物件被不透明的东西完全遮盖时，其光照被遮挡。若你再次施展该法术，则该法术终止。

若你将一名敌对生物持有或穿戴的物件作为目标，该生物必须成功通过敏捷豁免检定，否则法术生效。

materials.value: 一团萤火虫或者磷光苔藓

Sacred Flame.name: 圣火术
Sacred Flame.description:
如同火焰般的辉光向施法距离内你能看见的一个生物倾泻而下。目标必须要进行一次敏捷豁免，豁免失败则受到 1d8 点光耀伤害。目标在这次豁免检定中无法获得半掩护和四分之三掩护的增益。

戏法强化： 该法术的伤害会在你达到下列等级时增加 1d8：5 级（2d8），11 级（3d8），17 级 1d8（4d8）。

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内创造出下列魔法效应之一：

  • 你的声音在 1 分钟内变得比常人响两倍。
  • 你在 1 分钟内使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色。
  • 你使地面震动 1 分钟（完全无害）。
  • 你使某种声音自施法距离内一点瞬间发出，例如雷鸣声，鸦叫声或不祥的低语声。
  • 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗瞬间打开或关上。
  • 你在 1 分钟内改变自己眼睛的颜色。

多次施展该法术时，你可以同时维持最多三个持续 1 分钟的效应。你也可以用一个动作驱散其中一种效应。

Command.name: 命令术
Command.description:
你对施法距离内一个你能看见的生物说出一个单词的命令。目标必须通过一次感知豁免，否则在其下一回合中必须服从该命令。如果目标是亡灵、不理解你的语言，或者你的命令会直接伤害到它，则法术无效。

以下是一些典型命令及其效果。你也可以发出此处描述之外的命令。如果这样做，由DM决定目标如何行动。如果目标无法遵循你的命令，法术结束。

过来。 目标以最短最直接的路线向你移动，若其到达你 5 尺范围内，则结束其回合。

放下。 目标放下持握的任何东西，然后结束其回合。

走开。 目标消耗其整个回合，以最快最有效的方式远离你。

趴下。 目标陷入倒地状态并结束其回合。

立定。 目标不移动且不执行任何动作。飞行生物会保持在空中，前提是它能够这样做。如果它必须移动才能保持飞行，它会飞行所需的最小距离以保持在空中。

升环施法。 当你使用 2 环或更高法术位施展此法术时，你使用的法术位每比 1 环高一环，就能多影响一个生物。当你指定目标时，这些生物彼此之间必须在 30 尺内。

Shield of Faith.name: 虔诚护盾
Shield of Faith.description: 围绕着施法距离内你指定的一个生物出现一片闪着微光的魔法力场。使目标在法术持续时间内 AC 获得+2 加值。

materials.value: 一小块写有神圣文字的羊皮纸

Hold Person.name: 定身类人
Hold Person.description:
选择你能看见的、位于施法距离内的一个人形生物。目标必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则被麻痹，持续至法术终止。在其每回合结束时，目标可以进行另一次感知豁免。豁免成功则法术对该目标终止。

升阶施法效应。当你使用3环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比2环高一环，就可以多指定一个目标。你指定目标时，这些人形生物必须彼此相距30尺以内。

materials.value: 一片直的小铁片

Spiritual Weapon.name: 灵体武器
Spiritual Weapon.description:
你在施法距离内创造一把漂浮的灵体武器，其持续至法术持续时间结束或你再次施展此法术前。当你施放此法术时，你可以对武器5尺内的一个生物进行一次近战法术攻击。命中时，目标受到等于1d8 + 你施法关键属性调整值的力场伤害。

在你的回合，你可以用一个附赠动作将武器移动至多20尺，并重复对武器5尺内的一个生物进行攻击。

武器可以是你选择的任何形态。与特定武器相关的神祇的牧师（例如圣·库斯伯特以其钉头锤闻名，托尔以其战锤闻名）会使此法术的效应模仿该武器。

升环施法效应. 当你使用3环或更高法术位施展此法术时，所使用的法术位每比2环高2环，伤害就增加1d8。

False Life.name: 虚假生命
False Life.description:
你从死灵法术中获得了额外的生命力。在法术持续时间内，你获得 1d4 + 4 的临时生命值。

升环施法： 使用二环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，其给予的临时生命值就增加 5。

materials.value: 一小瓶酒或蒸馏酒精

Frostnip (b).name: 冻伤 (b)
Frostnip (b).description: 指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

Leather Armor.name: 皮甲
Leather Armor.description: 该护甲的护胸和护肩由通过油煮硬化的皮子制成。护甲的其余部分则由更软更灵活的材料制作。

Dark Devotion.name: 黑暗忠诚
Dark Devotion.description: 邪教狂信者为抵抗魅惑和恐慌而进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
狂信者作为 4 级施法者，其施法属性为感知（法术豁免 DC 11，法术攻击命中 +3）。

狂信者准备了以下牧师法术：

戏法（随意）：光亮术，圣火术，奇术

1 环（4 法术位）：命令术，致伤术，虔诚护盾

2 环（3 法术位）：定身类人，灵体武器

狂信者是一个施法者，其施法属性为感知。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 邪教狂信者发动两次近战攻击。

Dagger.name: 匕首
Dagger.description:
近战或远程武器攻击：命中+4，触及5尺或射程20/60尺，单一生物。命中：4 (1d4 + 2) 穿刺伤害。

邪教狂信者使用匕首发动攻击。

Light.name: 光亮术
Light.description:
你触碰一个大型或者更小，且未被他人携带或着装的物件。在法术终止前，物件将在其 20 尺半径范围内发出明亮光照，并在其外 20 尺范围发出微光光照。光的颜色由你决定。该物件被不透明的东西完全遮盖时，其光照被遮挡。若你再次施展该法术，则该法术终止。

若你将一名敌对生物持有或穿戴的物件作为目标，该生物必须成功通过敏捷豁免检定，否则法术生效。

Sacred Flame.description:
如同火焰般的辉光向施法距离内你能看见的一个生物倾泻而下。目标必须要进行一次敏捷豁免，豁免失败则受到 1d8 点光耀伤害。目标在这次豁免检定中无法获得半掩护和四分之三掩护的增益。
